metadata.synopsis: A wounded Karlach responds when players heal her out of dialog. She's extremely grateful.

0.speaker: Karlach
0.text: Thanks. That was really starting to hurt.

1.speaker: Karlach
1.text: If you cast anything at me, I'll break your fingers.
1.context: NodeContext: calmly and casually warning a player from casting a spell on her - even if it's a healing spell.
